content: dr horrible or any goggle-y character you wish to be goggles pattern you will need 1 yarn in dark grey medium grey and black these colors are for the dr horrible style choose whichever colors you want for your own just make sure you have three colors i used caron simply soft in grey heather charcoal heather and black 2 size h crochet hook 5 mm 3 polyfil or other soft stuffing material 4 tapestry needle base 1 using the grey heather chain 20 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 19sts turn 3 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet all the way across 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 21sts turn 4 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet all the way across 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 23sts turn 5 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet all the way across 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch 25sts turn 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 25sts turn 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 25sts turn 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet to end of row 25sts turn 9 chain 2 11 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 11 half_double_crochet 25sts turn 10 2hdctog 8 half_double_crochet 5 slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet 2 hdctog 23sts turn 11 2 hdctog 5 half_double_crochet single_crochet 7 slip_stitch single_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 2 hdctog 21sts 12 chain 1 single_crochet all the way around the edge of the base to give it a clean edge when you reach the 7 slip_stitch nose stitches do 7 sl sts instead of single_crochet and continue using single_crochet after those 7 sts when you reach the chain 1 stitch join with a slip_stitch note it doesn t really matter how many single_crochet you do up the sides of the base but i found that single_crochet 11 made it easier to center things later on i also found that it was easy to edge the top and the bottom of the base because there are already stitches in place back side of chain at the top and single_crochet along the bottom that you can use as a guide weave in ends straps do this twice once on each side of the flat base 1 using the charcoal heather join yarn on side so that you can crochet 7 centered stitches 2 single_crochet in from top or bottom of base and then single_crochet those 7 stitches turn 2 chain 2 7 half_double_crochet turn 3 chain 2 7 half_double_crochet turn 4 chain 2 7 half_double_crochet tie off 5 join black yarn 7 single_crochet across turn 6 chain 2 7 half_double_crochet turn 7 2sctog 3 single_crochet 2sctog turn 8 chain 1 5 single_crochet turn repeat row 8 until strap is desired length tie off do steps 1-8 on other side of base for other strap weave in ends raised base 1 using the charcoal heather chain 16 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 15sts turn 3 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch
